content: materials a purl soho nine-note bundle 1 which includes… - 9 skeins of 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% baby alpaca yarn each skein is 100 yards/ 50 grams approximately 710 yards required we used the colors pomelo and begonia note this yarn is only available in the nine-note bundle you will also need… - us 6 4 mm 32-inch circular needles 2 - stitch marker 3 gauge 21 stitches and 36 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern see notes size finished dimensions approximately 12 inches high x 55 inches in circumference designed for purl soho by keith foster 1 https //www purlsoho com/nine-note-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964
